instruction.title: Color
instruction.text: In the text, VIEW shows you the simple past and past progressive verbs.

instruction.title: Click
instruction.text: Click on each simple past and past progressive verbs you find in the text and VIEW will show you whether you guessed right or wrong.

instruction.title: Multiple Choice
instruction.text: Choose the simple past or past progressive from the drop-down list and VIEW will show you whether you guessed right or wrong. You can get help by clicking on ?.

instruction.title: Fill in the blanks
instruction.text: Fill in the blanks with the correct form of the verb in either simple past or past progressive. If you guessed wrong or you find it too difficult you can get help by clicking on ?.
